function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of accessibility to green areas for residents with low socioeconomic status","Impact":"Exclusion of a significant portion of the population from health-promoting outdoor activities","Mitigation":"Implementing policies and actions to enhance accessibility of green areas for low-income residents","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, digital mapping for identifying underserved areas","People":"Residents with low socioeconomic status","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Influence of gender and number of children on access to green areas","Impact":"Potential exclusion of female respondents and their children from enjoying green areas","Mitigation":"Conducting detailed research on the influence of gender and number of children on access to green areas and discussing specific policies for children and families","Technologies":"Survey data analysis, qualitative research methods","People":"Female respondents, parents, children","Owner":"Research institutions, policymakers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Discrepancy in use of specific green areas by urban and rural residents","Impact":"Unequal access to different types of green areas based on residency, leading to disparities in health and well-being","Mitigation":"Developing policies to facilitate the use of specific green areas for all residents, regardless of urban or rural residency","Technologies":"GIS mapping, community outreach and engagement","People":"Urban and rural residents","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local government, community organizations"}]}
